every.title: JavaScript Practice Task - every Method
every.description: Your task is to write a function that checks if all elements in an array are greater than 10. Use the JavaScript every method to accomplish this.
every.example: For the input [11, 12, 15, 20], the result should be true. For [5, 12, 15], the result should be false.

someOtherTask.title: Another JavaScript Task
someOtherTask.description: This task involves writing a function that checks if some elements in an array meet a certain condition.
someOtherTask.example: For the input [5, 12, 15], the result should be true if any value is above 10.
